content: heatherly™ sport weight 80% acrylic 20% merino wool 328 yards/100g * seaglass 29543 2 3 3 3 4 4 hanks this classic cardigan combines an appealing geometric pattern with super soft yarn paired with the cute as a button baby hat it s a special gift for the littlest ones in your life the cardigan is worked bottom-up flat splitting for front and back at the underarm and joining at the shoulder arms are picked up at armhole and knit in the round
